== Event : Ubuntu Global Jam 13.09 ==

=== 1. Introduction ===

{*} The members of the Ubuntu community are meeting on March 1 to March 3, 2013 where groups LoCoteam each other write documentation, find, sort and repair bugs and test the next version of Ubuntu. while the public can contribute to the Jam.
=== 2. Event context ===

{*} Venue : ISET of Sidibouzid<<BR>>
{*} Date : on September 13 to September 15, 2013<<BR>> 
{*} Time : 3 days<<BR>> 
{*} Organizer : the community of ubuntu-tn<<BR>> 
{*} Target public : everyone<<BR>>
